What’s New in neo-mamba¶

This chapter describes the most important changes between the neo-mamba versions. For a detailed list of all changes see the CHANGELOG.

  • What’s New in neo-mamba 0.1
    • Introduction
    • core
    • network
    • storage
  • What’s New in neo-mamba 0.2
    • Preview 2 compatibility
    • Bug fixes
  • What’s New in neo-mamba 0.3
    • Preview 3 compatibility
    • Updates beyond preview 3 compatibility
  • What’s New in neo-mamba 0.4
    • Smart contracts and Node capabilities
    • Audit results
    • No external documentation updates
  • What’s New in neo-mamba 0.5
    • Preview 5 compatability
  • What’s New in neo-mamba 0.6
    • RC1 compatability
  • What’s New in neo-mamba 0.7
    • RC2 compatability
